original_text: And he put shields and spears in all the cities and made them very strong. So he held Judah and Benjamin.
korean_text: 모든 성읍에 방패와 창을 두어 매우 강하게 하니라 유다와 베냐민이 르호보암에게 속하였더라

sentences.original_text: And he put shields and spears in all the cities
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 모든 성읍에 방패와 창을 두었고

sentences.original_text: So he held Judah and Benjamin
